Package com.lawranta.layers

Class LayerContainer

java.lang.Object
com.lawranta.layers.LayerContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LayerContainer extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains all the layers of the program in an arraylist. It is SINGLETON , there should only be ONE instance of LayerContainer
